did.unittitle: University of Arizona Agricultural Experiment Station annual reports, 1919-1961

origination.label: Creator

did.abstract: Typescript reports on crops, weather, and horticulture. Some include photographs and financial statements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript reports on crops, weather, and horticulture. Some include photographs and financial statements.
